root: ^Time seems to stand still. You cannot move.
^The crowd has vanished but the Priest remains.

priest: ^You stuggle against unseen bonds. "Fortune smiles on you, girl. Those idiot villagers seem to be stupider even than I imagined! But no matter, you will not escape."
priest_1: ^"I mean you will hang as a witch!" He cries. "And then I will be free!" He laughs hysterically.
priest_2: ^"Fool child, still you do not understand." His maniacle laugher echoes accross the square.
priest_final: ^His laughter dies and he faces you.
^"Perhaps you are brighter than you appear." He considers you for a moment, something hangs in the balance.
^With a flash he vanishes. You are free.
